pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semi-Supervised Classification, Regression and Clustering Methods // Providing a collection of techniques for semi-supervised classification, regression and clustering. In semi-supervised problem, both labeled and unlabeled data are used to train a classifier. The package includes a collection of semi- supervised learning techniques: self-training, co-training, democratic, decision tree, random forest, 'S3VM' ... etc, with a fairly intuitive interface that is easy to use.
